text: Although awareness of cancer's prevalence in the United States improves and medical advances in the field abound, pancreatic cancer has largely been absent from the list of major success stories.
author: Chris Van Hollen

text: There's a lot of interest from the medical community on how things develop in microgravity, and the hope, later, that is expected to apply to what the changes are in humans as well.
author: Linda M. Godwin

text: Modern medical advances have helped millions of people live longer, healthier lives. We owe these improvements to decades of investment in medical research.
author: Ike Skelton

text: After I read all the medical journals and watched all the documentaries, I still didn't understand the physical sensation of ticking and where it comes from and what it feels like.
author: Robin Tunney

text: Reform of the medical liability system should be considered as part of a comprehensive response to surging medical malpractice premiums that endanger Americans' access to quality medical care.
author: Lincoln Chafee
